pages.text: $(item)Fish Fighter Enchantment (Lv.1-5)$() can be found as loot from zombies, drowned, guardians, or elder guardians:$(br)$(li) Zombies: Can drop Lv.1-3 $(item)Fish Fighter Enchantment$().$(br)$(li) Drowned: Can drop Lv.2-4 $(item)Fish Fighter Enchantment$().
$(li) Guardians: Can drop Lv.4-5 $(item)Fish Fighter Enchantment$().$(br)$(li) Elder Guardian: Always drops Lv.5 $(item)Fish Fighter Enchantment$().
